name: jiff-mpc
description: Server/client library for building MPC applications using JavaScript; handles relaying shares between parties.
author: Kinan Dak Albab <babman@bu.edu> (http://cs-people.bu.edu/babman/)

scripts.gen-docs: jsdoc -r -c docs/jsdoc.conf.json && sed -i -e 's/lib\/ext\/README.md/extensions.html/g' docs/jsdoc/*.html && sed -i -e 's/lib\/ext\/Hooks.md/hooks.html/g' docs/jsdoc/*.html && sed -i -e 's/Hooks.md/hooks.html/g' docs/jsdoc/*.html && sed -i -e 's/CONTRIBUTING.md/CONTRIBUTING.html/g' docs/jsdoc/*.html && grep -rl "module:jiff-client~JIFFClient#" docs/jsdoc/*.html | xargs sed -i 'html' 's/module:jiff-client~JIFFClient#//g'
scripts.tutorial: npm install && cd tutorials && node index.js
scripts.build: browserify lib/jiff-client.js --debug -s JIFFClient -o dist/jiff-client.js && browserify lib/ext/jiff-client-websockets.js --debug -s jiff_websockets -o dist/jiff-client-websockets.js
